item.title: Arrange the Words
item.description: Welcome to the first post in the Programming Puzzle of the Day (aka PPotD) series! I came across this challenge on HackerRank, as part of a developer candidate test from a company that shall remain nameless ;) My submission passed all of the automated test cases, but I remember it as being so sloppily written that I thought I'd rewrite it just for the hell of it. Later on, I rewrote the whole thing in Golang, also just for the hell of it – because why not?
